summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. Ahead, a white sedan is moving in the same lane. The white sedan suddenly slows down and moves closer to the self-driving vehicle, potentially causing a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the white sedan ahead. Over the past 8 seconds, the distance between the self-driving vehicle and the white sedan has decreased significantly, indicating that the white sedan has slowed down or the self-driving vehicle has accelerated.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down and moving closer to the self-driving vehicle.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A silver sedan is ahead, initially in the same lane. The sedan then moves to the right lane, and a black car appears from the right side, moving into the self-vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while following the silver sedan. As the silver sedan moves to the right lane, the self-driving vehicle continues straight. The black car from the right lane cuts into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate slightly to maintain a safe distance.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving to the right lane. 2) Right: A black car, approximately 15 meters away, cutting into the self-vehicles lane.
